statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 2 , -13 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 8 , -18 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 10 , 4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 3 , -18 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
